featureName: Telemetry Hygiene: Date-Scoped Summaries for Persona Test Verification
description: Add date-based filtering to persona telemetry summaries to enable clean verification insights that exclude stale historical data.
note: Issue #34 COMPLETE (2025-12-04). Added date filtering to summarize-persona-runs.mjs with --since and --window flags. Updated runbook with filtering examples and verification workflow. All tests passing (63/63). Bonus: Fixed cooldown, mobile responsive, and WebSocket mock test infrastructure issues.
